column4: I asked this about 20 times yesterday without an answer, so I apologize for continuing to spam
I am using TightVNC Viewer on WinXP and Ubuntu's Remote Desktop feature...  Any way that I can copy/paste text between my WinXP system and the VNC session?
I can't type without looking at the keys, so this is a real issue for me.
kword can print pdfs. not sure if that helps you though
can't openoffice print to pdf too?
